title: New Media Pundits | The Ragtag Heroes of an Upside Down World
description:
On Nov. 4th I spoke at the Vancouver Students For Liberty (SFL) Annual Conference.  The subject of the conference was The New Media, and the other speakers included Jordan Peterson, Bret Weinstein and Theryn Meyer.  

I spoke of the recent emergence of a new band of media pundits who have rallied around free speech, figures like Jordan Peterson, Joe Rogan, Dave Rubin, Sargon of Akkad, Ben Shapiro, Gad Saad and many others.  I discuss how a world becomes upside down as it exhausts itself and the role of the outliers and tricksters in putting the world back on its feet.  

Support this channel:
patreon: https://www.patreon.com/pageauvideos
paypal: paypal.me/JonathanPageau

website: http://www.pageaucarvings.com
facebook: https://www.facebook.com/jonathanpageau
twitter: https://twitter.com/PageauCarvings
